abstract: Toyota said its profit rose 7.5 percent in the October-to-December quarter as its strategy of shifting its focus to emerging markets appears to be paying off.
snippet: Toyota said its profit rose 7.5 percent in the October-to-December quarter as its strategy of shifting its focus to emerging markets appears to be paying off.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO  Toyota reported Tuesday that its profit rose 7.5 percent in the October-to-December quarter as its strategy of shifting its focus to emerging markets from the United States appears to be paying off.

headline.main: Toyota’s Profit Rises on Shift in Strategy
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Profit Rises on Shift in Strategy
